message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice.
I'm starting strong, but I'm willing to compromise. This 3/1 split is a good starting point. Let's see if you can do better.
I've decided to propose a 45/55 split. I hope this is more acceptable. Let's aim for fairness.
You're getting closer, but I still think I can get a better deal. This 4/1 split is a bit more reasonable. Let's see if you can do better.
I propose a 30/70 split. I believe this offers a fair compromise considering the diminishing value of our currency with each passing round.
